choices: Some boy cousins come over to play as well.
1.content: Your mother and sister has gone over to mom's sisters for the weekend and left your older brother Tyler in charge of You and your younger brother Syd.
1.title: Boy's only night

choices: Tyler suggested paper, rock & scissors to see who goes first
12.content:
After about half of the first day had passed, our older brother Tyler came into my room, " hey what's up Johnny ? I was thinking that you, me and Syd could play a game. .." I looked at my big brother Ty and smiled as I said " a game would be cool Ty, have you talked to Syd yet ? What kind of game were you thinking about big brother ? " .

Ty stood there thinking and suddenly his eyes shit open wide as he said " Let's all play truth or dare, but the adult version since mom and dad wont be back for a good while " looking at him grinning I said " what is the adult version Ty, will we have to do stuff to each other ? " as it was now my turn to smile and grin, " Well I am definitely in Ty but you need to talk to Syd first and let him know that all dares will be anything that we say.

I watched Tyler smile and walk out of my room and into Syd's room, I was already thinking about my first dare I will give ....
12.title: Tyler sets up the game

info.brief_description: The boy's in the Donner family plays truth or dare together.
info.description:
Only male Donner family plays a game of truth or dare.

No vore or gore, no toilet stuff.

Incest and oral is great !
